faq.question: What is 1-on-1 Teaching Friend platform?
faq.answer: The 1-on-1 Teaching Friend platform is a platform where a teacher and a student can have personalized and customized learning experience with a one-to-one interaction.

faq.question: How do I schedule a one-on-one class with a teacher?
faq.answer: You can schedule a one-on-one class by choosing a time that works for you and the teacher.

faq.question: How long is each one-on-one class?
faq.answer: Each one-on-one class is typically 45-60 minutes long, but the duration can be customized based on the student"s needs.

faq.question: What technology or equipment do I need to have to take Teaching Friend classes on this platform?
faq.answer: You will need a computer/laptop with an internet connection and a webcam. You may also need a headset or microphone for better audio quality.

faq.question: Can I cancel or reschedule a one-on-one class?
faq.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule a one-on-one class, but please make sure to do so at least 24 hours before the scheduled start time.
